content: Now our monthly sales for the first nine months of fiscal 2022 have averaged close to $5 million a month and yet, according to Nielsen data, we are still outperforming the category and growth and outpacing the top 10 brands. Our drivers for growth remain the same with a fourth quarter fiscal 2022 and fiscal 2023, expanding marketing, expansion of our direct store delivery network, E-Commerce, club, specialty growth, hospitality, functional CBD water, additional co-packer expansion and sustainability initiatives.
